tool_description: Get access to a comprehensive database of weightlifting exercises and detailed muscle information. We also provides calculators for key metabolic metrics like TDEE, BMR, BMI and IBW.
name: gym-fit
title: gym-fit

api_list.name: getMuscleById
getExerciseById
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gym-fit.p.rapidapi.com/exercises/exercise/41aeff91-79d7-4d73-883d-f61d117dc0d8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gym-fit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gym-fit.p.rapidapi.com/exercises/exercise/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gym-fit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
